function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate measurement of the transmission rate from hospital data","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the effectiveness of implemented measures","Mitigation":"Validation of data accuracy and precision through multiple testing methods","Technologies":"Data validation tools and statistical analysis software","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the association between transmission rates and NPI, weather, and VoC","Impact":"Ineffective decision-making on implementing control measures","Mitigation":"Continual monitoring and reassessment of the associations, considering multiple variables","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, statistical modeling software","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reliance on parameter values from the scientific literature","Impact":"Potential bias or inaccuracy in the interpretation of transmission rates","Mitigation":"Verification of parameter values through sensitivity analysis and comparison with real-world observations","Technologies":"Sensitivity analysis tools, simulation software","People":"Modelers, researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
